actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to 1954 to provide that the Federal excise tax on telephone service does not apply to amounts paid as State tax on the same service.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt amounts paid as State or local taxes on telephone service from the Federal excise tax on telephone service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to 1954 to provide that the Federal excise tax on telephone service does not apply to amounts paid as State tax on the same service.
